body_html:
It's unfortunately how Python multiprocessing works. If close it too aggressively it leaves a lot of orphans that you have to stop yourself.

I don't know what python [defunct] means in nvidia-smi. @ngimel maybe you do? Is it another nccl feature?
body_text:
It's unfortunately how Python multiprocessing works. If close it too aggressively it leaves a lot of orphans that you have to stop yourself.
I don't know what python [defunct] means in nvidia-smi. @ngimel maybe you do? Is it another nccl feature?
body:
It's unfortunately how Python multiprocessing works. If close it too aggressively it leaves a lot of orphans that you have to stop yourself.

I don't know what `python [defunct]` means in `nvidia-smi`. @ngimel maybe you do? Is it another nccl feature?
